fields.description: Circumstance or event that has capacity to cause error
fields.name: A - Reportable circumstance

fields.description: Error occurred but it did not reach the patient
fields.name: B - Near miss

fields.description: Error reached patient but no harm
fields.name: C - None

fields.description: Error reached patient requiring monitoring or intervention to preclude harm
fields.name: D - Minor - required monitoring

fields.description: Error reached patient, temporary harm + intervention required
fields.name: E - Minor - intervention required

fields.description: Actions to sustain life of patient
fields.name: H - Severe
